title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) Victoria | Coronavirus Victoria
description: What you need to know about COVID-19 in Victoria.
cleaned_text: Six simple steps to protect yourself and those most at risk [ ](/recovery) Managing COVID-19 at home Information on getting the right help for your recovery, and getting support to match your COVID-19 symptoms COVID-19 resources [ ](/information-for-seniors-covid-19) COVID-19 advice for seniors Being prepared is the best way to reduce your risk from COVID-19, including making a plan to access antivirals. [ ](/info-people-with-disability) COVID-19 advice for people with disability Information about COVID-19 for people with disability and people caring for them. [ ](/protectcommunity) COVID-19 information for Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander communities Information and resources for Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Victorians and Aboriginal Community Controlled Organisations [ ](/children-young-people-and-covid-19) COVID-19 advice for children and young people Information and resources about COVID-19 for parents, guardians, carers and young people. [ ](/translated-information-about-coronavirus-covid-19) Translated information about COVID-19 Translated health and business support information in more than 50 languages.
